languages.text: "В том, как ты упиваешься своим злодейством, есть что-то комичное".
"There is something hilarious about the way you are revelling in your villainy."
languages.original_text: "В том, как ты упиваешься своим злодейством, есть что-то комичное".

traits.locale_text: "There is something comical about the way you are revelling in your villainy."
"There is something comical about the way you are revelling in your villainy."
"There is something hilarious about the way you are revelling in your villainy."
"There is something hilarious about the way you are revelling in your villainy."
"There is something hilarious about the way you are revelling in your villainy."
"There is something hilarious about the way you are revelling in your villainy."

languages.text: « C'est assez comique de voir à quel point vous vous délectez de votre méchanceté. »
languages.original_text: "There is something hilarious about the way you are revelling in your villainy."

traits.locale_text: « C'est assez comique de voir à quel point vous vous délectez de votre méchanceté. »

languages.text: «La forma que tienes de regodearte en tu maldad tiene un toque cómico».
languages.original_text: "There is something hilarious about the way you are revelling in your villainy."

traits.locale_text: «La forma que tienes de regodearte en tu maldad tiene un toque cómico».

languages.text: “你沉迷邪恶之路的样子，让我觉得有点滑稽。”
languages.original_text: "There is something hilarious about the way you are revelling in your villainy."

traits.locale_text: “你沉迷邪恶之路的样子，让我觉得有点滑稽。”

languages.text: 「悪役ぶって悦に入る姿は、どこか滑稽なものだな」
languages.original_text: "There is something hilarious about the way you are revelling in your villainy."

traits.locale_text: 「悪役ぶって悦に入る姿は、どこか滑稽なものだな」

languages.text: "Es hat etwas Urkomisches an sich, wie Ihr Euch in Eurem Schurkentum badet."
languages.original_text: "There is something hilarious about the way you are revelling in your villainy."

traits.locale_text: "Es hat etwas Urkomisches an sich, wie Ihr Euch in Eurem Schurkentum badet."

languages.original_text: "There is something hilarious about the way you are revelling in your villainy."
